title.en: Prayer That Synthesizes the Blessed Speech of Several Learned and Accomplished Masters

text.en: To the gracious guru, who embodies all sources of refuge,
I pray; please look upon me with your eyes of compassion.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tukjé chen gyi zik

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may dispel my attachment to saṃsāra.
Grant your blessings so that renunciation may arise in my mindstream.
text.en-trans: ngejung gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may let go my concerns for this life.
text.en-trans: tsé di lo yi tongwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may journey to pleasant mountain retreats.
Grant your blessings so that I may bring to mind contentment while alone.
text.en-trans: drokmé lo dé drenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that freedom from compulsion1may arise in my mindstream.
text.en-trans: gömé gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may make the most of the freedoms and advantages.
Grant your blessings so that I may remember mortality from the depths of my heart.
text.en-trans: chiwa nying né drenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that recognition of impermanence may arise in my mindstream.
text.en-trans: mi tak gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may remember it is uncertain when I will die.
Grant your blessings so that I may recognize the beings of the six classes as my parents.
text.en-trans: dro druk pamar shepar jin gyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may develop boundless compassion.
Grant your blessings so that I may know the virtues to adopt and non-virtues to avoid.
Grant your blessings so that I may see the infallible law of cause and effect.
text.en-trans: gyundré lumé tongwar jin gyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may have the determination2to practice the Dharma.
text.en-trans: chö la nyingrü nüpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that my mind may merge with the Dharma.
text.en-trans: rangsem chö dang drepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that adverse circumstances may become my allies.
text.en-trans: kyen ngen drok su charwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that the delusion of dualistic grasping may be destroyed.
Grant your blessings so that delusive appearances may manifest as unreal.
Grant your blessings so that I may always remember the guru.
Grant your blessings so that devotion may arise from the depths of my being.
Grant your blessings so that all appearances and existence may arise as the guru.
Grant your blessings so that my mind and your wisdom mind may merge inseparably.
text.en-trans: tuk yi yermé drepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so that I may realize the view beyond extremes.
Grant your blessings so that meditation may be integrated continuously.
Grant your blessings so that my conduct may be free from acceptance and rejection.
Grant your blessings so that I may attain the result of the three kāyas.
text.en-trans: drebu ku sum tobpar jingyi lob
